languages.text: Секретный состав, подаренный Кровавой паутиной, служит грозным оружием против всякого создания из металла.
A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.
languages.original_text: Секретный состав, подаренный Кровавой паутиной, служит грозным оружием против всякого создания из металла.

traits.locale_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

languages.text: Ein geheimes Präparat des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, das als vortreffliche Waffe gegen Kreaturen aus Metall dient.
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

traits.locale_text: Ein geheimes Präparat des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, das als vortreffliche Waffe gegen Kreaturen aus Metall dient.

languages.text: Une formule secrète révélée par la Toile de Sang constitue une arme formidable contre toutes les créatures faites de métal.
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

traits.locale_text: Une formule secrète révélée par la Toile de Sang constitue une arme formidable contre toutes les créatures faites de métal.

languages.text: Un compuesto secreto, donado por la Red Sanguinolenta, sirve como formidable arma contra cualquier criatura hecha de metal.
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

traits.locale_text: Un compuesto secreto, donado por la Red Sanguinolenta, sirve como formidable arma contra cualquier criatura hecha de metal.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブより提供された秘伝の化合物は、金属でできたあらゆる生物に対する強力な武器となる。
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブより提供された秘伝の化合物は、金属でできたあらゆる生物に対する強力な武器となる。

languages.text: 由织血罗网赠予的神秘化合物，非常适合对付金属生物。
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.

traits.locale_text: 由织血罗网赠予的神秘化合物，非常适合对付金属生物。

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı tarafından tedarik edilen gizli bir bileşen, metalden yapılma her türlü yaratığa karşı muazzam bir silah görevi görüyor.
languages.original_text: A secret compound donated by the Bloodspun Web serves as a formidable weapon against any creature made of metal.
